prompt: Design a contact support page with a clean, nature-inspired theme using earthy tones. Use a light beige background (Colors.brown[50]). Center content with 24px padding. Display a 'Contact Support' title in dark brown (Colors.brown[900]) with a bold font. Add a subtitle 'Weâ€™re here to assist' in grey (Colors.grey[600]). Include a form with Name (person icon), Email (email icon), and Message (multiline, message icon) fields, each with a white background (Colors.white) and brown borders (Colors.brown[600]). Arrange contact cards for Phone, Email, and Live Chat in a horizontal wrap layout, each with a light brown background (Colors.brown[100]) and rounded corners. Place a 'Send Message' button at the bottom with a dark brown background (Colors.brown[900]) and white text. Use 20px spacing for a balanced layout.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Colors.brown[50],
      appBar: AppBar(
        backgroundColor: Colors.brown[50],
        elevation: 0,
        title: Text('Support', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.brown[900])),
        leading: Icon(Icons.arrow_back, color: Colors.brown[900]),
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(24.0),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Text(
              'Contact Support',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 28,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.brown[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8),
            Text(
              'We\'re here to assist',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 16,
                color: Colors.grey[600],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            TextField(
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Name',
                prefixIcon: Icon(Icons.person, color: Colors.brown[600]),
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Colors.white,
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Colors.brown[600]!),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            TextField(
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Email',
                prefixIcon: Icon(Icons.email, color: Colors.brown[600]),
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Colors.white,
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Colors.brown[600]!),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            TextField(
              maxLines: 4,
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Message',
                prefixIcon: Icon(Icons.message, color: Colors.brown[600]),
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Colors.white,
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Colors.brown[600]!),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            Wrap(
              spacing: 12,
              runSpacing: 12,
              alignment: WrapAlignment.center,
              children: [
                Container(
                  width: 150,
                  padding: EdgeInsets.all(12),
                  decoration: BoxDecoration(
                    color: Colors.brown[100],
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  ),
                  child: Column(
                    children: [
                      Icon(Icons.phone, color: Colors.brown[900]),
                      SizedBox(height: 8),
                      Text('Phone', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.black)),
                      Text('+1 234 567 8900', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black)),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
                Container(
                  width: 150,
                  padding: EdgeInsets.all(12),
                  decoration: BoxDecoration(
                    color: Colors.brown[100],
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  ),
                  child: Column(
                    children: [
                      Icon(Icons.email, color: Colors.brown[900]),
                      SizedBox(height: 8),
                      Text('Email', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.black)),
                      Text('support@app.com', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black)),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
                Container(
                  width: 150,
                  padding: EdgeInsets.all(12),
                  decoration: BoxDecoration(
                    color: Colors.brown[100],
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  ),
                  child: Column(
                    children: [
                      Icon(Icons.chat, color: Colors.brown[900]),
                      SizedBox(height: 8),
                      Text('Live Chat', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.black)),
                      Text('Available 24/7', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black)),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            SizedBox(
              width: double.infinity,
              height: 50,
              child: ElevatedButton(
                onPressed: () {},
                style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                  backgroundColor: Colors.brown[900],
                  shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10),
                  ),
                ),
                child: Text(
                  'Send Message',
                  style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, color: Colors.white),
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
